City of Columbus Utilities Department

**Department Heads:   Kevin Faichtinger (Water/Gas)**

**Rolando Tello (Wastewater)**

For emergencies call: (979) 732-2366 (City Hall)
or (979) 732-2388 (Sheriff)
Inspection grades:
Good to excellent reports in all three departments.

Where to drop off payments: City Hall - 605 Spring Street, Columbus, TX from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday thru Friday.
A drop box is available in drive-thru 24 hours a day, every day.
Where to mail payments: City Hall - P. O. Box 87
Columbus, TX 78934

[here](https://www.municipalonlinepayments.com/columbustx)

Telephone (IVR) payments may be made by dialing 833-273-7457.
Late payment charges: After ten days have expired from billing date, the city assesses a late fee of 5% of the outstanding balance.
